text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria adamsonii is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to French Polynesia. The epithet adamsonii commemorates Robert Stephen Adamson.
text.References: Florence, J. (1998). "Psychotria adamsonii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30475A9552409. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30475A9552409.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
